documentation.text: Returns the price data for the given base/quote pair. Revert if not available.
Similar to getReferenceData, but with multiple base/quote pairs at once.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (string memory,string memory) view external returns (struct IStdReference.ReferenceData memory)
function (string memory[] memory,string memory[] memory) view external returns (struct IStdReference.ReferenceData memory[] memory)
function (string memory,string memory) view external returns (struct IStdReference.ReferenceData memory)

documentation.text:
!UPDATE
 
 ethUsd - latest price from Chainlink oracles (ETH in USD * 10**8).
 weiUsd - USD in Wei, received by dividing:
          ETH in Wei (converted to compatibility with etUsd (10**18 * 10**8)),
          by ethUsd.

Taking bets function.
 By winning, user 2x his betAmount.
 Chances to win and lose are the same.
Returns the price data for the given base/quote pair. Revert if not available.
Similar to getReferenceData, but with multiple base/quote pairs at once.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (string memory,string memory) view external returns (struct IStdReference.ReferenceData memory)
function (string memory[] memory,string memory[] memory) view external returns (struct IStdReference.ReferenceData memory[] memory)
function (string memory,string memory) view external returns (struct IStdReference.ReferenceData memory)

documentation.text:
!UPDATE
 
 ethUsd - latest price from Chainlink oracles (ETH in USD * 10**8).
 weiUsd - USD in Wei, received by dividing:
          ETH in Wei (converted to compatibility with etUsd (10**18 * 10**8)),
          by ethUsd.

Taking bets function.
 By winning, user 2x his betAmount.
 Chances to win and lose are the same.

convInUsd().notice: !UPDATE  ethUsd - latest price from Chainlink oracles (ETH in USD * 10**8). weiUsd - USD in Wei, received by dividing:          ETH in Wei (converted to compatibility with etUsd (10**18 * 10**8)),          by ethUsd.

game(uint256,uint256).notice: Taking bets function. By winning, user 2x his betAmount. Chances to win and lose are the same.
